name: reCaptcha light as dark
description: this style is defined as global due to the visibility. the style restyles only light reCaptchas to the dark theme equivalent. it also shows a little note in the bottom left corner. so you know that this reCapatcha is originaly configured with a light theme. "reCaptcha light as dark" reCaptcha Docs - option for dark theme - see the 'g-recaptcha tag attributes and grecaptcha.render parameters' table reCaptcha - api2 - Demo as the new invisble mechanism does not provide a dark theme. I am testing to override these new mostly invisible captcha eye-catcher.
